mav_sim.tools.rotations module¶

various tools to be used in mavPySim

Conversions between different orientation representations

mav_sim.tools.rotations.Euler2Quaternion(phi: float, theta: float, psi: float) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

Converts an euler angle attitude to a quaternian attitude :param euler: Euler angle attitude in a np.matrix(phi, theta, psi) :return: Quaternian attitude in np.array(e0, e1, e2, e3)

mav_sim.tools.rotations.Euler2Rotation(phi: float, theta: float, psi: float) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

Converts euler angles to rotation matrix (R_b^i)

Note that R_b^i is the same as R_b^v as the transform from the vehicle frame to the inertial frame is purely translation

mav_sim.tools.rotations.Quaternion2Euler(quaternion: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]) → tuple[float, float, float]¶

converts a quaternion attitude to an euler angle attitude :param quaternion: the quaternion to be converted to euler angles in a np.matrix :return: the euler angle equivalent (phi, theta, psi) in a np.array

mav_sim.tools.rotations.Quaternion2Rotation(quaternion: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

converts a quaternion attitude to a rotation matrix

mav_sim.tools.rotations.Rotation2Quaternion(R: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

converts a rotation matrix to a unit quaternion

mav_sim.tools.rotations.hat(omega: ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

vector to skew symmetric matrix associated with cross product

mav_sim.tools.rotations.rotz(theta: float) → ndarray[tuple[int, ...], dtype[Any]]¶

Calculates the rotation matrix about the z axis

Parameters:

theta – Angle of rotation

Returns:

Resulting rotation about z-axis
